title: Assign Autopass access to users
content:
To log in to the AutoPass Licensing Server (APLS), the users must have the Autopass_Admin or Autopass_View permissions.

Before assigning the Autopass_Admin or Autopass_View permissions, make sure the users are associated with a group.

Assign Autopass_Admin access for a suite admin

  1. Log in to the IdM server using the URL https://<HOST>:<PORT>/idm-admin.
  2. Go to the Organization tab and click SYSBO.
  3. Select Roles on the left pane and click ADD ROLE.
  4. Type Autopass_Admin in the Name field or use any desired name.
  5. Type Autopass_Admin in the Display Name field or use any desired display name and add a description for the role in the Description field.
  6. Select APLS in the Application field or leave the field empty.
  7. In the Associated Permissions drop-down, select autopass_admin.
  8. Click SAVE.
  9. Select Groups on the left pane and select the desired existing user group. Or, you can create a new group and assign the newly created role. 
  10. Search and select the newly created role in the Group Settings >Associated Roles field.
  11. Make sure that the user gets associated with the updated group.
  12. Click SAVE.

Assign Autopass_Admin access for a tenant admin

  1. Log in to the IdM server using the URL https://<HOST>:<PORT>/idm-admin.
  2. Go to the Organization tab and click the desired tenant organization.
  3. Select Roles on the left pane and click ADD ROLE.
  4. Type Autopass_Admin in the Name field or use any desired name.
  5. Type Autopass_Admin in the Display Name field or use any desired display name and add a description for the role in the Description field.
  6. Select APLS in the Application field or leave the field empty.
  7. In the Associated Permissions drop-down, select Autopass_Admin.
  8. Click SAVE.
  9. Select Groups on the left pane and select the desired existing user group. Or, you can create a new group and assign the newly created role. 
  10. In the Group Settings >Associated Roles field, search and select the newly created role.
  11. Associate user to the group. See the section "Associate user to a group."
  12. Click SAVE.

Assign Autopass_View access for a tenant admin

  1. Log in to the IdM server using the URL https://<HOST>:<PORT>/idm-admin.
  2. Go to the Organization tab and click the desired tenant organization.
  3. Select Roles on the left pane and click ADD ROLE.
  4. Type Autopass_View in the Name field or use any desired name.
  5. Type Autopass_View in the Display Name field or use any desired display name and add a description for the role in the Description field.
  6. Select APLS in the Application field or leave the field empty.
  7. In the Associated Permissions drop-down, select Autopass_View.
  8. Click SAVE.
  9. Select Groups on the left pane and select the desired existing user group. Or, you can create a new group and assign the newly created role. 
  10. In the Group Settings >Associated Roles field, search and select the newly created role.
  11. Associate user to the group. See the section "Associate user to a group." 
  12. Click SAVE.

Associate user to a group

  1. Log in to the IdM server using the URL https://<HOST>:<PORT>/idm-admin, click the organization name, then click on the Groups tab. This page displays the group name and the related roles.
  2. Choose a group, then click   to edit an existing group.
  3. In Associated Users, search for the user, and select the user to add to the group. You can add multiple users to the selected group.  
  4. Click SAVE to apply the changes.
